body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is John Smith and I'm a customer service agent at Stellar Solutions, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sandra. Can you please spell out your first name and last name so I can update your profile correctly?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format of day, month, and year separately?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. Zero seven, zero two, one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that. Can you also tell me your phone number, digit by digit, including the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. Seven one four, five five five, four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your details, Sandra. I have updated your profile. Is there anything else that I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sandra. Have a great day!
